glsa.title: PulseAudio: Insecure temporary file usage
glsa.synopsis: An insecure temporary file usage has been reported in PulseAudio, possibly allowing symlink attacks.

background.p: PulseAudio is a sound system for POSIX OSes.

description.p: The pa_make_secure_dir function in core-util.c does not handle temporary files securely.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PulseAudio users should upgrade to the latest version:
